content:
SSC CGL 2025 Notification Released.
Apply online for Group B and Group C posts.
Eligibility: Graduate candidates.
Last date to apply: 15 September 2025.
Apply at: https://ssc.nic.in
title: SSC CGL 2025 Notification
description: This is a short description of the job role, eligibility, process etc. for test purpose only. This is a short description of the job role, eligibility, process etc. for test purpose only

content:
Indian Railways Apprentice Recruitment 2025.
Apply before 10 August 2025.
Eligibility: ITI certificate holders.
Apply at: https://www.rrb.gov.in
title: Railways Apprentice 2025
description: Apprenticeship opportunity in Indian Railways for ITI certified candidates. This job expires soon. Grab the opportunity before it's gone.

content:
Delhi Police Constable Recruitment.
Apply by 20 July 2025.
Eligibility: 12th Pass.
Apply at: https://www.delhipolice.nic.in
title: Delhi Police Constable Recruitment
description: Recruitment drive for Delhi Police Constables. This job posting has now expired but was valid for candidates with 12th qualification.
